query: can you please tell me how to use this?
response: Mr. Khurana, I'm happy to assist you with the mobile charger that's currently on the screen. To use it, simply plug the charger into a power outlet, and then connect the other end to your mobile device using the appropriate cable, usually a USB-C or micro-USB cable, depending on your device's port. Make sure the charger is compatible with your device to avoid any damage. If you need further clarification or have any specific questions about the charger, please don't hesitate to ask, Mr. Khurana.
